text:
Hello! We are starting to develop a Java Servlet application and we have 
choosen to use Tomcat as our Application Server.
We have defined initially a Context as follows:       

<Context path="/sinerj"
    docBase="/japps/sinerj"
    crossContext="false"
    debug="0"
    reloadable="true" >
</Context>

The goal is to have an area in which our servlets are TESTED along with the 
progress of their development.
In these schema, having a Server who reloads every time he uses a class is 
mandatory because of the normal duty of a programmer: write down one class or 
part of it then test it using sofwtare instruments.
The fact is that out brand new Apache 3.18  does not work anymaore and in 
anyway!
Pls help me (us) !!!!!

Please provide explicit detail of what doesn't work. Reloading works fine
for most cases, or at least it works for me.
